## Constitutional Compliance

- [ ] CHK-CONST-001 Feature scope limited to WAVAX/USDC pool only (Principle 1)
- [ ] CHK-CONST-002 Autonomous monitoring/rebalancing implemented (if applicable, Principle 2)
- [ ] CHK-CONST-003 Gas costs tracked for all transactions (Principle 3)
- [ ] CHK-CONST-004 Swap fees calculated and recorded (Principle 3)
- [ ] CHK-CONST-005 Incentives/rewards tracked (Principle 3)
- [ ] CHK-CONST-006 Profit/loss calculations verified (Principle 3)
- [ ] CHK-CONST-007 Financial data exportable (Principle 3)
- [ ] CHK-CONST-008 Rebalancing thresholds prevent excessive transactions (Principle 4)
- [ ] CHK-CONST-009 Gas estimation used before submission (Principle 4)
- [ ] CHK-CONST-010 External calls have timeout/retry logic (Principle 5)
- [ ] CHK-CONST-011 Transaction failures logged with full context (Principle 5)
- [ ] CHK-CONST-012 Partial failures trigger rollback/safe termination (Principle 5)
- [ ] CHK-CONST-013 Slippage protection enforced on all swaps (Principle 5)
- [ ] CHK-CONST-014 Circuit breaker implemented for error thresholds (Principle 5)
- [ ] CHK-CONST-015 Manual recovery procedures documented (Principle 5)
